Ruby.en: An unavoidable punch that is thrown from shadows.

Sapphire.en: An unavoidable punch that is thrown from shadows.

Emerald.en: An unavoidable punch that is thrown from shadows.

FireRed.en: The user throws a punch from the shadows. It cannot be evaded.
FireRed.de: Angriff mit der Faust aus dem Schattenreich. Ausweichen unmöglich.
